Package org.jetel.exception

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IParserExceptionHandler
    Interface for common handling of BadDataFormatException in parsers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractParserExceptionHandler
    Basic abstract implementation of IParserExceptionHandler interface.
    ConfigurationProblem
    Instances of this class are collected in ConfigurationStatus, which is return value of all checkConfig() methods in the engine.
    ConfigurationStatus
    This class is return value of all checkConfig() methods in the engine.
    LenientParserExceptionHandler
    Parser exception handler with type "lenient".
    ParserExceptionHandlerFactory
    The factory for creating ParserExceptionHandlers from a String.
    StrictParserExceptionHandler
    Parser exception handler with type "strict".
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationStatus.Priority  
    ConfigurationStatus.Severity  
    PolicyType
    This enum represents type of policy as reaction on BadDataFormatException in parses.
    TempFileCreationException.Reason
    Reason for the exception: NO_SPACE_AVAILABLE – temp file can not be created because there is no space on any of devices; not recognized in standalone engine IO_EXCEPTION – generic I/O exception without further detail
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AttributeNotFoundException
    Exception cast when requrested XML attribute (its value) can't be found or resolving reference to global (TransformationGraph level) variable/property can't be done - the property key is not present.
    BadDataFormatException  
    ClassCompilationException  
    ComponentNotReadyException
    A class that represents general Jetel exception
    CompoundException
    An exception which can have multiple causes exceptions.
    ConfigurationException
    Exception derived from ConfigurationProblem.
    CopyException
    An exception for all errors joined with data transfering between a clover record and an initiate member row.
    DataConversionException  
    FieldNotFoundException  
    GraphConfigurationException
    A class that represents exception indicating misconfigured Graph.
    InsufficientLicenseException  
    InvalidGraphObjectNameException
    Exception which occures when name of graph element (Node, Edge, Metadata etc.)
    JetelException
    A class that represents general Jetel exception
    JetelRuntimeException
    Clover specific runtime exception.
    LoadClassException
    This exception is mainly used when an issue with class loading occurs.
    MissingFieldException
    An exception indicating that an attempt was made to access a non-existing field.
    NotInitializedException  
    NullDataFormatException  
    ObfuscatingException
    This is exception derived from an existing exception.
    RecursiveSubgraphException
    A runtime exception thrown in TransformationGraph analysis when recursive subgraph hierarchy is detected.
    SerializableException
    This exception should be used whenever you want to be sure an existing exception is really serializable.
    StackTraceWrapperException
    This exception allows to wrap an existing error message and stacktrace in string form.
    TempFileCreationException
    Custom exception for problems occurring when temp. file is being created.
    TransformException
    Exception is thrown in custom transformation function.
    UnexpectedEndOfRecordDataFormatException  
    UserAbortException
    This exception represents intentional abortation of a graph by user.
    XMLConfigurationException
    Exception thrown when graph object deserialization from XML fails for any reason.
